prompt: Write a gentle message to someone feeling overwhelmed by responsibilities.
generated_text:
Write a gentle message to someone feeling overwhelmed by responsibilities.

Dear [Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I can tell that you're feeling a bit overwhelmed with your responsibilities right now, and I want you to know that you're not alone. It's totally normal to feel like you're drowning in tasks and obligations sometimes, especially when there are so many expectations placed upon us.

Remember that it's okay to take a step back and prioritize your own needs and well-being. You don't have to do everything, and it's important to set boundaries and say no when you need to. It's okay to ask for help when you need it, and don't be afraid to reach out to me or other friends and family for support.

You're a wonderful and capable person, and you got this! Take things one step at a time, and don't be too hard on yourself. You're doing your best, and that's all anyone can ask for.

Sending you lots of love and support.

Best,
[Your Name]
